tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: I went ahead and installed some basic building blocks within this Workspace so we can jump into creating custom charts quickly.

paragraphs.text: Right-click to open the Design Space map for a birds eye view of the workspace.
The building blocks I installed are:
Everything we do today will be built on top of this basic setup. I will walk you through what I installed to give you an idea of what we will be building on top of today.
